entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Scie 01:30 AM NST Sunday 05 February 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -12.5°C
Wind: NW 34 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 12 this evening then steady.
entry.summary: Flurries or snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm except locally 10 cm in snow squalls. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 80 this evening then west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Temperature rising to minus 12 this evening then steady. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 04 February 2023
